examples.example: 我打开冰箱，发现还有一罐我最爱喝的饮料，真开心。

translate.english: I opened the refrigerator and found that there was still a can of my favorite drink. I'm really happy.

examples.example: 我从超市买了一罐蜂蜜，准备用来泡甜甜的蜂蜜水。

translate.english: I bought a can of honey from the supermarket and am going to use it to make sweet honey water.

examples.example: 我从柜子里拿出一罐糖果，与朋友们一起分享这份甜蜜。

translate.english: I took out a can of candies from the cupboard and shared this sweetness with my friends.
